com.futuresailors.battleships

Class UIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.futuresailors.battleships.UIHelper

  • public class UIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class with some static methods which will be used by some of the View objects. We also store the height & the width the window should be here to allow the JFrame & Panels to grab instead of passing each time.
    Author:
    Michael Conroy

      • createCustomButton

        public static javax.swing.JButton createCustomButton(java.lang.String imagePath,
                                                     int width,
                                                     int height)
        Creates a JButton stripped of the default formatting and displays the image passed.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The file path to the image that the button should display.
        width - - The width the new button should be.
        height - - The height the new button should be.
        Returns:
        JButton - The new button based on the parameters passed.

      • resizeImage

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon resizeImage(java.lang.String imagePath,
                                                int width,
                                                int height)
        Resizes a given image to a given width & height. Used for the background, icons and button images etc.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The path to the image that needs resizing.
        width - - The new width for the image.
        height - - The new height for the image.
        Returns:
        ImageIcon - The resized image.

      • readFile

        Reads a file into the program.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path of the file.
